analysis.headline: Shares Your Data with Affiliates
analysis.quote: Except as disclosed in this Privacy Policy, we do not disclose personal information to any companies not part of Northwest Registered Agent, its parent, subsidiaries, affiliates, business partners, or related entities.

analysis.headline: Collects Your Sensitive Data
analysis.quote: Sensitive PI: SSN, financial account logins, precise geo-location (if used for services), communications content (if used with or for services).

analysis.headline: Records Your Calls & Emails
analysis.quote: If you call us or exchange emails with our customer service representatives, we may record the phone call or retain the email string to help improve our training and services.

analysis.headline: Your Data Becomes Public
analysis.quote: Certain Personal Information may become public record when documents are filed with the federal or state government, or with a court.

analysis.headline: Meta Tracks Your Browsing
analysis.quote: Our website uses Meta Pixel for analytics and advertising purposes.

analysis.headline: Partners Track Your Activities
analysis.quote: The use of tracing technologies by our service providers, technology providers or other third parties is not covered by our Privacy Policy.

analysis.headline: Retains Your Data Indefinitely
analysis.quote: After any such service is concluded, any such information collected will be retained for the maximum amount allowed by law and/or subject to exemptions under applicable privacy acts.

analysis.headline: Requires Parental Consent 13-17
analysis.quote: For individuals 13-17, we require parental consent to provide any of our Services.

analysis.headline: Identity Verification for Rights
analysis.quote: Where this is not possible, we may request that you submit additional documentation for verification.
